Producer: Jules Daly, Brad Feinstein, Ryan Stowell, Kevin J. Walsh
Screenwriter: Theodore Bressman, David Branson Smith, Max Winkler
Synopsis: When a devastating loss in the ring leaves Lion and his manager/brother Stan in debt to a local crime boss, they are forced to risk it all in a bare-knuckle boxing tournament as the pair fight for a better life.
Title: Jungleland
